item.title: FHN
item.description: score:100 Chances: First Horizon Corp. has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report. First Horizon was awarded national Gold level recognition for its commitments to employee health and well-being as measured in the American Heart Association’s 2023 Workforce Well-being Scorecard.
